solution_line_template: Daisy and Rose each have {legs_per_person} legs so between them, they have {legs_per_person}*{number_of_people} = <<{legs_per_person}*{number_of_people}={human_legs}>>{human_legs} legs

There are {total_legs_in_pool} legs in the pool and {human_legs} belong to Daisy and Rose so there are {total_legs_in_pool}-{human_legs} = <<{total_legs_in_pool}-{human_legs}={dog_legs_in_pool}>>{dog_legs_in_pool} legs in the pool
Dogs have {legs_per_dog} legs and there are {dog_legs_in_pool} legs in the pool so there are {dog_legs_in_pool}/{legs_per_dog} = {number_of_dogs} dogs in the pool
